description: Retrieves the status of automated sensitive data discovery for one or more accounts.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for each account, for as many as 50 accounts. To retrieve the status for multiple accounts, append the accountIds parameter and argument for each account, separated by an ampersand (&). To retrieve the status for all the accounts in an organization, omit this parameter. (string) ---

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each account specified in the request. Each object specifies the Amazon Web Services account ID for an account and the current status of automated sensitive data discovery for that account.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID for the account.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of automated sensitive data discovery for the account. Possible values are: ENABLED, perform automated sensitive data discovery activities for the account; and, DISABLED, don't perform automated sensitive data discovery activities for the account.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
